description: [Threat Group-3390](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0027) has used a modified version of Mimikatz called Wrapikatz.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE UNION June 2017)(Citation: Nccgroup Emissary Panda May 2018)(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Talent-Jump Clambling February 2020)(Citation: Profero APT27 December 2020)
